entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023
